response:
In a young female with subacute onset (3 weeks) and back pain with inflammatory features (worse in morning, better with movement), demyelinating or inflammatory causes are most likely. Compressive lesions must be excluded.

differential_diagnosis = ["Multiple Sclerosis (Transverse Myelitis)", "Neuromyelitis Optica Spectrum Disorder (NMOSD)", "MOG-Antibody Associated Disease", "Spinal Cord Tumor (e.g., Ependymoma, Meningioma)", "Idiopathic Transverse Myelitis", "Thoracic Disc Herniation", "Sarcoidosis"]
